website_summaries.verdict: Well-made reusable bags with reliable closures for a decent price. The fact that you get 10 bags in the set adds to the overall value.
pros: A good deal, as you get a pack of 10 that includes 4 sandwich and 4 snack bags
Can be used in the freezer
cons: Bags have a plastic smell that goes away after washed several times
Washing them by hand is advised

customer_reviews.title: The best reusable bags!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands of reusable bags and I really enjoy these the best. I like that there is no separate apparatus to close or seal these bags, they have a sturdy ziploc style closure and their lay flat design is idea for maximizing space. We have used these on camping trips in our cooler and have been pleasantly surprised how waterproof they are. They are perfect for taking snacks for my toddler when we are on the go, and my husband uses them in his lunches. These have been a great buy and make me feel better about using less one time use plastic products.
customer_reviews.author: Ardena

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and closes with ease
customer_reviews.text: The quality is there and they close very very easily and satisfying. The plastic is thick enough to where it won't rip unless you really are trying to rip it. I would definitely recommend a hand wash I think that's what they recommend as well. I will be using these for my bigger snacks and sandwiches or whatever when I can especially for picnics or going out to the river these are perfect and will save money In the long run and save the environment from more plastic in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Not being able to dish wash them, and needing to put them over cups to dry makes them not really "easy" to clean, and means they take up a lot of counter space to clean, but they do clean. I stopped using snack bags and put my nuts and whatnot in these instead. It's just as convenient but means I'm throwing away way less trash. Good quality, durable. Happy with the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. Very thick and sturdy. Wash up easily and come in three different sizes. I feel so responsible eliminating one more single use plastic from my home by doing away with disposable ziploc bags.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Better than other reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use them for lunches every day. My 8-year old hand washes them when she unpacks our lunch boxes. I especially like the fact that they have the size and user “instructions” right on each bag. I have purchased other reusable bags and I was not impressed with the other brands. I highly recommend these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Pagel Werner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags, simple enough to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. They are very durable which is great, but also called for a larger lunch pail as they take up a lot of space. We have gotten used to it though and really like them. They are easy to clean, but cannot go in the dishwasher. I recommend the Boon Grass drying rack, you can prop open 4-5 bags to dry at once this way. Much easier than using cups as the ad suggests. I am very happy to not be throwing away 5-6 plastic bags a day now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four stars for one reason
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really do like these bags. Exactly what I was looking for at a reasonable price. I gave it four stars for one reason though. They come in a single use plastic bag. It’s a bummer that the point of these is to reduce single use plastic and they come packaged in it. Hopefully they can realize the silliness here and find a new packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Smith

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for about a month now and these bags have had no disappointments from the start. These bags are so easy to clean and any smell of previous food comes right out with one quick wash. They're very durable and thick, I've stuffed food in them multiple times and they always go right back to their shape and don't get stretched out. The seals do a great job of keeping food fresh, in my experience they keep food fresher than ziplocks or plastic wrap. I'm so happy I found these, an amazing way to reduce plastic waste.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: Great for Doll Accessories
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase these to help keep doll accessories organized and outfits grouped together. They feel durable and are just hard enough to open so that other little fingers can’t get into them. The bright colors are also nice to visually see them in the bigger container they are stored in. I will likely need to purchase more to hold future doll items! I like their sturdiness compared to a regular ziploc bag. I may even buy the gallon sized ones in the future to store books so they don’t get damaged. The feel of them would make me consider using them for food.
customer_reviews.author: LB in PA

customer_reviews.title: Bags breaking after less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried half a dozen brands of reusable storage bags. They all disappoint for one reason or another (don’t close or break usually). I’ve had these for less than two months, I have only hand washed them, but they are now breaking at the colored zipper part, splitting where it meets the clear section. The zip parts work ok, some close easily but some are a hassle to close.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorbabes

customer_reviews.title: So far not good!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this bag and while I was soaking it before cleaning, it let go when I walked away. (Just hot soapy water was in it) I only stored leftover asparagus in it. I hope the rest doesn't fail.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Emrick

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty handy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a trip to the river where we needed reusable items while on the river. I placed food and a phone in their own bags. Everything remained dry! Now, I didn't dunk my phone under the water to test the leak-proof test, but it did end up in the water for a very brief minute. Needless to say I was very happy these were leak proof. They are more difficult to wash and dry and one of the bags did stain from the food. Other than that these bags are an awesome addition to our family's reusable food containers.
customer_reviews.author: Sunset Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase. So very happy I bought them. Easy to clean, easy to use, cuts down on my waste and decreases the money I spend on Ziplocs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Nolan

customer_reviews.title: They're nice...
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of these, and the colour of the zip area is useful for me to differentiate the bags at a quick glance. The problem I have is that 3 of the bags have broken seams so are unusable for anything that required being airtight. Cleaning is tolerably easy, I use a bottle brush to get all the edges and corners. If I could find a set of only the quart sized bags, and that they were better quality I would but more.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not really
customer_reviews.text: They don’t reseal. Barely used at all, with a couple washes. The ability to reseal seems to be made ineffective somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Ham Beau

customer_reviews.title: Product as described but not what I actually needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to help decrease the amount of single use plastics my family uses. These bags are great for sandwiches to go to work, or small treats/snacks for lunches. But I shouldn't have purchased the "lay flat" style. I wanted to utilize these bags for storing my lettuce/greens after they've been washed/dried. To store my washed broccoli, asparagus, Brussels etc., but the "lay flat" style doesn't really provide enough room to do that with the quantities I am purchasing/storing. The product itself is great, and I definitely am able to utilize it for some things, but the lay flat just isn't flexible/big enough to do what I originally intended.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, easy to seal
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love these. I tried a different brand previously and hated them. These bags zip so easily and they are colorful and have great sizes. I have started a Facebook group to promote products better for the environment and I put these on there. I have just ordered my second set and got my mother in law and a friend to buy some as well. I hardly touch disposable ziplocs anymore. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: HannahW

customer_reviews.title: Great replacements coming from Ziplocks
customer_reviews.text: If you are reading this and wondering if these can be as pliable and useful as Ziplocks, as I was, these really are great replacements for even freezer Ziplock baggies. I really didn't want super thick stiff bags, I wanted bags similar to Ziplocks and these delivered on that plus they are very durable. Unfortunately my order did come with a gash mark on the two largest bags in my set, but I contacted the seller and this issue is being resolved already, they answered within the day. The others in the set are fantastic quality, leak proof, washed up well and are a really nice thickness. Not too thick and stiff, but not thin and flimsy either.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Gage

customer_reviews.title: Defective bags split open on first use!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are defective! I hand washed them and tried to use them for my room temperature leftover pasta sauce. But it started leaking because there were two slits in different places! So I tried another bag that seemed fine, but the bottom split open as soon as I sealed the top! These bags are supposed to be reusable but I didn’t even get one use out of them! I’m mad that I have to spend probably half the item cost to ship back this horrible defective product!!
customer_reviews.author: Wbdgr

customer_reviews.title: Holes after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: The medium sized (blue top) had rips in the side seams when I went to clean it after use # 3. What terrible quality! And I am gentle in use and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: EBatus

customer_reviews.title: There are better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have done some more research before purchasing these. I didn’t realize that there are reusable ziploc bags that can also be placed in the microwave, dishwasher and can be used for sous cooking. All of which these cannot. Other than that they have worked for storage purposes.
customer_reviews.author: amblbrow

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen essential
customer_reviews.text: So in the picture you can see there’re 4 small ones 4 medium ones and 2 in large size. In the video you can see i had a hard time opening the ziplock which means they are SUPER LEAK PROOF!!!! I LOOOOOVE THE Material and texture of it!! It lookds very very durable and THIS IS A MUST IF YOU WANT TO FREEZE FRUITS FOR SMOOTHIES!!!! even though the material is thick, it keeps the food inside frozen or cold enough!!! THIS IS A MUST IN YOUR FRIDGE/KITCHEN!!!! remember to wash and clean them before using!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a variety of different things already and I am not disappointed. They are super easy to clean and dry out fast as long as you put them over a cup to dry. I have frozen food in these and I haven’t had any issues. I have also thrown in some silverware in one and the forks didn’t ruin the baggie, which I was a little nervous would happen. I’m happy that I decided to get these since they work for what they are needed for, and I will be saving money in the long run
customer_reviews.author: Amm

customer_reviews.title: Great reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for about a month now and they are as good as new. They get used a little less than daily, mostly for packing lunches. They seal easily and are waterproof. Handwashing is not a problem for us, that's how we wash all our dishes. A minor problem I've had is that the sandwich bags are bigger than a disposable or fabric sandwich bag and don't really fit in the small lunch sack I carry. They are no problem for the larger lunch boxes my husband uses.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these bags and we feel good about using them. It's a bit of a pain in the butt to clean them, but it's worth it. I enjoy that they don't seem to retain any odors from foods.
customer_reviews.author: butternut squash

customer_reviews.title: Saves Waste!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these bags for about a month. So far they are heavy duty and have not worried about them breaking. They are not the easiest to clean because they are not dishwasher safe. Drying them after handwashing is the most difficult part. Definitely worth it for the waste that is saved from disposable bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Duffett

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after a few uses...do not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I've had the set for a whole 2 weeks, and two have already broken. The bottom falls out....not impressed
customer_reviews.author: annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Go no plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Wish you they stood up - they are really good alternatives to the old plastic bags
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hanson Endres

customer_reviews.title: Multiple have split on seams
customer_reviews.text: These are great sizes and work well but I have had 3-4 split on the seams after just a few uses. They are completely leak proof until they split open. Also, it is really inconvenient not to be able to put them in the dishwasher. The quantity of bags for the price is very good compared to other brands but they don’t seem as durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe not for me
customer_reviews.text: I never use these because they are not dishwasher safe. As a mom, washing each one of these by hand is just not going to happen. They have some that are dishwasher, top shelf safe and really wish I had gotten Those. These never get used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less waste!
customer_reviews.text: These bags come in a good size assortment at a reasonable price, close easily, tightly and don't leak. The only reason I am giving them 4 stars instead of 5 is that they cannot go in the dishwasher. However they really aren't all that difficult to clean and I stick them over a cup to dry. They are thinner than a different type I tried, but that means they take up less space. I have used them in the freezer for chili and soup with no problem and no leakage. I plan on buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: nien

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a couple of months now and they're really amazing. The quality of the material is fantastic and they have been able to hold everything I throw at them. Both hot and cold food items. Sometimes, if the food is too hot, it will stretch the plastic, but it's nothing that breaks the bag. I stained one of mine when I placed some hot spaghetti sauce in it, but that happens with any plastic container. I haven't had to buy the ziplock throw away baggies and it's great. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Car-car

customer_reviews.title: A+ Reusable Bags - Eco Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these bags because we're cooking a lot more fresh food during covid and wanted to avoid using wasteful ziploc bags. We've used them in the freezer, in the fridge, and and in a lunchbox for a picnic and they've held up for all uses. We stocked up with 2 lbs. of ground beef and they worked great between freezing & defrosting. Was worried about smells & cleaning but so far there have been no issues after an easy standard washing. I went with the color coded option which is great when my wife and I are packing lunches and want to be sure we're grabbing our own sandwiches without unwrapping. A+ product!
customer_reviews.author: James U

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are not closing all of the way after 2 months of use. And now, the plastic has pulled away from one of the zippers. While there is no website for this company (at least none that I can find), there is an email for a warranty or money back request. I'm asking for money back. It's not worth it to me to receive more bags that will end up in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry snacks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these pretty regularly and have had no issues with them so far. They seal really well and do not leak or come apart at the seal. No tears so far. They are decently easy to clean as long as you make sure to prop them up while they dry so they can thoroughly drip dry. I wouldn't recommend using these for anything greasy or sticky though, as I imagine that would make them much more difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother, absolutely horrible
customer_reviews.text: Update: after using two of these the BOTH broke so I am returning. Not usable if they break open after washing or attempting to use one time. Just arrived today and I found a whole when I wash washing one. So far it's only one bit not very happy, don't recommend if it's going to be like this right out of the box. The others seam to be okay but we will see how they hold up to holding items and more washing
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags, and I love not having to purchase single-use plastic zip bags from the store. Just a suggestion about cleaning them. You can put is the dishwasher, but honestly, just squirt some dish soap in the bag, swish and rinse well. Hang them upside down to dry (maybe in your empty dishwasher. I slip them over the sprayer nozzel. You really want them dry before storing. Good environmental choice.
customer_reviews.author: Flatrockmama

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Leak Proof, Just Right
customer_reviews.text: These bags are just the right size. I love these smaller green-topped bags, especially. The next size up fits sandwiches very well and I haven’t even used the gallon-sized ones yet. I have (hand) washed these bags multiple, multiple times and they remain very durable and leak proof. Because of these bags, I haven’t bought disposable plastic bags in a long time. I’ve saved lots of money and hundreds of bags from going into the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: I just love that I won’t  have to throw away more bags
customer_reviews.text: I really think is a better option than continue buying the disposable ones, you can reuse this one as many times as you want and in my point of view is saving cost in long term, my wife and I do not like to waste, we take our own reusable bag to the grocery store so we do not have to throw a way like 10+ plastic bas every time we go to Walmart. And this is the same concept I they loom to be made of good material.
customer_reviews.author: José

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy ziplock baggies again!
customer_reviews.text: One of my goals for the year was to reduce my use of plastic so I decided to invest in these! My main concern with reusable bags was that they were not going to seal properly or that they just wouldn't be able to contain the things I needed. LET ME TELL YOU. I've stored everything from leaky tofu to all sorts of vegetables with no spillage, or more importantly weird plastic baggie smells. They seal like a dream and look great! They also stack very well and keep my fridge super organized. It comes with a bunch of different sizes so you have options for whatever you may need to baggie! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: fatima

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: so these shipped pretty fast, but almost all of them are already broken. Either they won’t seal or they have holes.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Henson

customer_reviews.title: worth it.
customer_reviews.text: i use the small bags to hold chips for my lunch. i clean it every 2-3 days. and leave it overnight to dry. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. I love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I really like them. They look and "stack" so much better in my freezer and fridge that those other flimsy plastic bags we ALL use. I am going to order more and it will be a bigger order. Also want to get some of the "flat" bottom ones, as well. I was using one while on Facetime with a friend. She asked what it was... Now I'm sending her a link so she can get some too. :D
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: good not to fill landfill with baggies.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I feel like I use sandwich bags and freezer bags too much. trying to cut down on the plastics in the landfill. These are OK, seem a little small. Even the large ones don't hold as much as I think they should. they freeze well, cleaning is a little harder and drying is a pain. But I think worth the effort. Next purchase will be just the gallon.
customer_reviews.author: clariseb

customer_reviews.title: Burst at seems
customer_reviews.text: Burst at seems when storing solid foods & liquid soups.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGirly

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to find ones I was willing to buy. These have been great so far. I only hand wash and it’s not the easiest or most convenient but it’s not really easy to find any quality that can be washed in any other way so it’s not a big deal. Comes with the territory. I have had no issues with them so far and love them. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Stain easily, difficult to wash and dry
customer_reviews.text: These are handwash only which I, unfortunately, did not realize until after purchasing. The biggest problem is that they don't stay open and are difficult to dry. There are too many crevices to dry by hand alone and should have some time open to air-dry. They stained after a single use whether from raw veggies like carrots and red peppers or from pizza. They do seem pretty leak resistant if not too full. When filled with water (to what I would have guessed was half capacity) the seal did not hold when the bag was handled and all of the contents poured out. I would not buy these again for food storage purposes but they may be useful for organization.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Close and seal easily. Freezer friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! Especially the gallon sized ones. I had purchased resuable ziplocks from buybuy Baby before and was always frustrated because the seals on the bags would be so hard to click together or would seperate on their own. These bags hold together so well, even when in a freezer. I have not spilled food or anything. Easy to clean too. I have not placed any liquids in the bag but if I place wet lettuce or juicy cut fruit, there has not been a spill. Would definitely recommend!!! Especially because they're reusable and will help cut the use of single use ziploc bags! Perfect for helping coat foods with bread crumbs
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to plastic bags.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great alternative to plastic baggies. They are very sturdy, but if you need to have all the air out of the bag, that can be tricky. They also like to stay together so you have to separate the layers when drying them out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: A zipper that does not sip
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to get these reusable storage bags in an attempt to cut down on the many zip-lock bags that we toss out each day. Unfortunately, I've used them for 3 months now and already they have quit zipping shut. The heavy plastic will be less biodegradable than the cheap plastic ones typically used once and tossed out. What a frustration and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Get Rid of Plastic
customer_reviews.text: These are super handy! I loved these so much I bought another, bigger set. The biggest bags has lots of space! Even the small ones were nice for cut up vegetables and the like. Super easy to clean, just soap and water and hang upside down over a cup to dry. Glad I'm able to help contribute to reducing our plastic use in the world with these.
customer_reviews.author: bffwct

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these as an alternative to single use plastic baggies. They are durable and seal nicely - I have been using for weeks and haven’t had a single leak. To clean, I add a squirt of dish detergent and warm water, seal, and slosh around then rinse clean. The most difficult part is getting them fully dried inside before storage - I have to prop them open with a water bottle or cup and leave to dry for a day or two. The plastic is starting to have some dents and folds, but still holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Joslin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the freezer!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had these very long, but so far I love them! I purchased these to be used in the freezer only. I was using containers from takeout that can not be recycled, but they take up too much room and crack easily when frozen. I have cut up fruit like bananas for smoothies and the zipper opens and closes each time like a charm. I will update this review after I have had them for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: MsHatch20

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: These reusable zip bags are a perfect alternative to one use plastic baggies. I am working on reducing my waste, so I haven't bought plastic baggies in a long time. I still found myself in need of something to store certain items in. I found these from a BuzzFeed list and was pleasantly surprised. They're thick and easy to zip. I tossed them in my lunch box and didn't have any problems with leaking. They're easy to clean, though drying can be a bit tricky if you don't remember to prop them open. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hartley

customer_reviews.title: More plusses than minuses.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are sturdy and usually close cleanly. I'm trying to be more environmentally conscious, and these bags easily replace my use-once-snd-discard bags The biggest drawback is the shape of the smallest bags. If they were square they'd fit a sandwich or sliced cheese. They are long and narrow so harder to use.
customer_reviews.author: Grazillda

customer_reviews.title: Durable and useful sizes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a couple months. I use at least one every day. They’re holding up beautifully! It says no dishwasher so I’ve been hand washing. Very durable. The smalls are great for nuts and other small snacks. The medium are good for sandwiches and chips. The large are like a gallon size and I use those for larger items at home. Mostly so glad to not be throwing away plastic!! Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic except the large bag seams tore apart after a month
customer_reviews.text: Really please with this plastic alternative. They are stiffer than plastic so it makes it easy to store in the fridge. And I have been freezing soup stock in the smaller size- they freeze well, don't tear and are generally easy to thaw and open. Great to bring for lunches at school/work, and also on trips, hiking, etc. The only issue is that our large gallon size split between the bag and the closing mechanism after a month. Highly recommend except for that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Liebschutz

customer_reviews.title: One more step towards helping our environment
customer_reviews.text: These reusable storage bags are wonderful, very durable, easy to clean and leak-proof. They are a good way to foster sustainable consumer practices by replacing single-use plastic bags. We have all heard how reducing use of plastic bags can mitigate harmful impacts to our environment as well as relieve pressure on landfills and waste management. This is a great gift to yourself and others. Buy some!
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: Stained
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage bags but I put some watermelon in one and the bag is stained. Weird, I could see if it was tomato sauce but watermelon stained it......
customer_reviews.author: Miat1of5

customer_reviews.title: Great waste-saving option!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I’ve had a few split on the bottom seam after a few uses but most I’ve used and washed 10+ times with no issue. I actually wash the small ones on the top rack of the dishwasher even though it says to hand wash. The bottom rack melts them though. Big ones still have to be hand washed because they’re tall but the recommended method of drying stretched over a cup works well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just received the product I actually saw Actress Eva Mendez was suggesting this product on her instagram stories. So, I decided I need to order. I probably go through 8-10 baggies weekly and I needed to change that. So far these bags have been used for snacks and past left overs but they are working out very well. Also there isn’t any weird smells of plastic or anything like that. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diana W

customer_reviews.title: Keeps bread soft. Environment saver.
customer_reviews.text: The large yellow ones I use for fresh bread and it lasts longer. The blue ones are perfect for a sandwich or deli meats, or even slip over refrigerated herbs like cilantro stood in a glass with water. The green ones work well for cheese. I highly recommend them. But just buy a little drying wrack that allows you to wash them out then drip dry them upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reusable bags for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are amazing and earned a rare a coveted 5 stars. They feel amazing in your hands because they are made from silicone, and they aren’t slippery for those of us with butterfingers. They are easy to open, easy to close, yet are completely leakproof. I have some filled with dog treats, some filled with meat, and some filled with electronics cables. I will never again feel the guilt of throwing away a plastic bag after one pathetic use, nor will I feel stupid for purchasing single use plastic products—this purchase has literally made my family 100% single use plastic free! Everyone needs these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic reusable storage bags! They are easy to close and do not leak. They have worked great in the freezer and were very easy to clean and dry. The bags feel very sturdy and the largest size is big enough to freeze chicken in. They have amazing customer service as well. Both of the gallon size bags came damaged and the seller actually sent an entire replacement set; not just the gallon bags. I thought this was great and they responded to all of my emails quickly. Would definitely recommend these storage bags and the seller :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for prepping school lunches. They are great for freezing, do not leak, and feel very durable. Have been using for weeks with no issues. They are a bit harder to pull open than a traditional thin ziplock, not a problem typically but a small child or someone with physical limitations on how they can grip or pull might have an issue. I love being able to wash them quickly in the sink and keep the regular plastic bags out of my trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J

customer_reviews.title: Sub-par
customer_reviews.text: The fact that these are not dishwasher safe would be okay IF they didn’t hold in the smell of whatever was being stored in them prior. I have to really soak and scrub these things to get the smell out which is just time consuming and takes up room in my sink. Even then, sometimes the smell doesn’t come completely out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Machado

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner pack
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few weeks now and am really enjoying them. They work great for packing my lunch and for toddler snacks on the go. They’re pretty easy to clean(if you have a dish brush that would work well). I like that they are easy to open and close-no hassle!They’re holding up well and I feel so much better about reducing my plastic waste. I’m planning on buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Foley

customer_reviews.title: Split Down The Seam
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these bags a couple of months ago, I loved them. I was so excited to stop using plastic! Unfortunately, when I pulled out one of the gallon sized bags from the freezer today, it had split down the seam. I'm super bummed because they weren't very cheap and I've only hand washed them and never microwaved them.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Sad these are poor quality
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed- I bought these thinking I’ll be elimiating waste. After a few months of use the zips don’t zip up any longer. I now have to throw these away just like any zip lock baggy. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: Reusable
customer_reviews.text: During this special time, we cook all raw meat once I got them, and store them in the freezer. We bought Reusable Storage Bags - 10 Pack BPA FREE Freezer Bags to store the cooked meat. So far, the bags have been working just like described, leaking proofing, easy to clean, and durable. Very good product with good quality, and the plus part is that it is reusable. Recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Huiyan Chen

customer_reviews.title: These are trash.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for four months trying my hardest to make them work because I want to like them. These are awful. They only close if you use the bottom 3/4s of the bag. I cant even get the small one to close over a single slice of tomato. There are definitely better brands out there. I finally caved and threw these away to purchase Stasher brand.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Too much work
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to clean. With all the cleaning that’s involved and the difficulty to dry them, I do not think they are worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Highly Durable. Highly Reusable.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product if you're tired of recycling old sandwich bags and ziplocks inside the home. These feel REALLY high quality and are easy to clean. I believe these will last a LONG time. It comes in multiple sizes. They are good for just about anything from cheese to meats. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JCS

customer_reviews.title: Great sustainable alternative to disposable bags
customer_reviews.text: I was super skeptical when I bought these, but I figured I’d give it a chance. Now I use them all the time! They have almost completely taken the place of disposable ziplock bags. They stand up well, they don’t keep smells, even from stronger smelling foods, and they are easy to clean. The only challenge I have with them is having a spot to dry them. I may invest in a drying rack specific to these bags soon. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JSC

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: I am using these bags for keeping snacks for lunch box and the gallon size bags to keep my pump parts at work. I have been using them only for a couple of weeks so far but they held up well and seems durable. They come in different colors and sizes which is nice. Cons: they are not easily bendable and takes longer to dry. I wish they are dishwasher safe but they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: sareen

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a bit, eventually melt in dishwasher and warp
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved these bags. I hand wash half the time, and the other half top rack in the dishwasher. Sometimes they come out great, and other times they completely melt! Super bummed as I placed 2 orders. If you can commit to hand washing and don’t mind them not being long lasting, they’re fine. I wish I had spent more on 100% silicone.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: good quality and good to look
customer_reviews.text: This cup is an excellent product that you can use for drinking coffee, hot chocolate, etc. In the past, I drink grains powders with water as my breakfast; it will have a lot of remains, and it will be hard to wash. This cup is easy to clean, and you just need to rinse with water. It also can be cleaned in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Albert S

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these bags as they aren't what I was looking for. They are nice, flexible, and well made. I was looking for the bags that have the folds on the bottom that enable them to stay open. I recommend this product if you don't mind them not staying open on their own.
customer_reviews.author: to share

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: I like my bags and feel good about using them. I wish there was an easier way to clean them.... I am experiencing issues getting them zipped up correctly...sometimes it is really difficult. Also, if you are worried about how they look do not turn them inside out to wash unless you can do it without crinkling the bag! The folds do not come out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mourning

customer_reviews.title: It seals well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags and some other bags, they look exactly the same...But it is not.I made a comparison between the two.I ended up pushing the others back because they were almost impossible to turn on and off...But these are all great.I think they are more effective than airtight plastic bags in the fridge, and although they were a bit tight for the first time, I haven't had any trouble since.I will consider buying it again after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Cheetham

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. So much stronger than ziplock bags. I clean them with lukewarm water and soap. I dry them after letting them sit upside down for awhile. I marinated fish in them and after a quick white vinegar rinse after washing, there was no smell. I do believe they could stain, but I’ve refrained from putting those types of foods in them.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I purchased a different brand in the past to reduce my single use bags and After a few uses (literally 1 or 2), they became impossible to close. I only have one of the six left that is usable. Needless to say, I was looking for a new kind and these delivered. The lock is easy to close, and seems to be durable but thin enough to maintain its easy usage. I’ve only been using these bags for a few weeks, so I can’t confirm overall durability, but they appear to be solid quality. I also love the variety of size with color coded tops. Overall, I definitely recommend these, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: dona prindle

customer_reviews.title: Just 1 exception
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, but one bag ripped along the seam. I already had food stored in the other bags and Amazon only allows a full return. If I could get the 1 bag replaced, I'd update to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Jo

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They're easy to open and close and so far are completely watertight. If they continue to work out I may have to buy some more. They really are just like a super sturdy Ziploc except I don't have to worry about them puncturing from something in a bag with them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Valintyne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for me
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't are for the bags. I stored peppers in one and I still haven't been able to get the smell out. Soaked it in everything except bleach. They also don't hold as much as I thought they would.
customer_reviews.author: Ltlbrd4u

customer_reviews.title: Few uses, then disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for these bags. The first few times I used them they were great—after that, the seals wouldn’t line up anymore so I couldn’t close the bag. Simple as that.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah P.

customer_reviews.title: The Ziplock doesn’t work after a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to have a plastic free solution for our kiddo’s lunches. These were great for the first couple times we used them but after a couple uses the ziplock does not close. If they do it is because I worked on it for 10+ minutes. They also need to be dried over a cup or something. It is a good idea but not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular sealable bags for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and easy to clean. (Haven't tried anything that stains--like greasy pizza slices.) You will need to dry them by hand or flip them upside down over a glass or container to air-dry. Very satisfied with the size variety--good for snacks, sandwiches, and lunch bag foods. Don't think I would use these for food storage in the freezer. Has anyone tried freezer storage?
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Bade

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with cut in middle of bags
customer_reviews.text: Opened package to find large bags both had a notch cut out of them – so yes, they leaked. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jill H.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far and will continue to recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a few weeks. They are easy to clean and I they feel like they are made of a durable and lasting material. I’m very happy with them so far. I had seen alternate designs in stores and they were poorly designed. This design seems significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: Cal_Bear_06

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality! Love these bags!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Quality is excellent, they are heavy duty and the zipper works really well. They wash up nicely and dry really quickly. They are not the typical size as the disposable store type but would work in place of those types. I will be purchasing more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Deana Smathers

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These bags are sturdy, leak proof, and hold a lot of stuff. I got tired of using ziploc, so got these as an alternative. They're great. The only downside is they can take a while to dry, if you're air drying them. Other than that, they've been perfect. I may get another set.
customer_reviews.author: Jody V.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again but not a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are leak proof and I bought them because I use zip locks way too often so I was hoping this would be a better alternative. Not a bad product but I find it extremely annoying to clean! I'm not mad about my purchase but there are too many time where I just want to toss them out rather than clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Leak-proof, Easy Clean, Reusable Food Grade Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are very useful bags with diverse size combinations. They seal perfectly in freezers and fridges without any leak. They can be reused and are easy to clean. Each seal band color correlates with each bag size, very helpful for identification with multiple bags in the freezer at the same time. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These were the first reusable baggies we have purchased. We had very high hopes but not quite what we were looking for. We find them hard to clean. We have to turn them inside out so stuff isn't missed in the corners when cleaning. Due to turning them inside out, the bags don't zip closed as well anymore. They have also stained pretty bad. We are looking for new ones that are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: The Russells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ecofriendly Substitute
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! They are the perfect size, seal really well, and look great. There was zero smell out of the box, but I still cleaned them as instructed. Cleaning was simple and took no time at all. I love that I won't have to buy plastic every again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great bags with many uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut down on our disposable waste. I loved them so much I bought a second set a month later. I use them for everything in our fridge. I even use them for traveling. I put all out liquids in there to prevent accidental spills in luggage. They also worked great at the beach as a bag for out cellphones, just to keep sand and water off them in my beach bag. They are very sturdy and you don't have to worry about tears. Needing to wash them after every use can be a bit tedious but to me it's worth it to save the waste. Every little bit helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kaurie

customer_reviews.title: The best way to safe money and safe the world
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! Great material, I use it to bring my lunch to work and for kids snacks and lunch!, that’s amazing so I won’t need to buy more plastic bags, is the best way to save your money, this bags are biodegradable, BPA Fred, eco friendly, also the zipper keeps the food safe an you can use it in the fridge whit out worry about the odors, I’ll definitely buy some more!!
customer_reviews.author: Yaz R

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize the bags are microwaveable or dishwasher safe. My mistake. But they are not durable. 2 have ripped at the seam and I’ve only had them since March (5months) even with being hand washed. I wouldn’t choose this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Too small to be useful
customer_reviews.text: Glad they are reusable but they are too small to be useful! You can’t store leftover chicken or corn cobs. Just a few snacks for the kids- a sandwich or a handful of baby carrots maybe. Wish they weren’t flat but roomier, with greater capacity.
customer_reviews.author: bets

product_meta.title: Reusable Storage Bags - 10 Pack BPA FREE Freezer Bags(2 Reusable Gallon Bags + 4 Leakproof Reusable Sandwich Bags + 4 THICK Reusable Snack Bags) Lunch Bags for Food Marinate Meat Fruit Cereal
feature_bullets: ♻REUSABLE & FOOD GRADE MATERIAL: Made of food-grade PEVA material, Qinline reusable storage bags are BPA -FREE, save our planet and save your money.

♻LEAK-PROOF & ESAY SEAL ZIPPER: The reusable lunch bags feature an upgraded zipper closures sealing technology that is more sealed, leak-proof, waterproof and hygienic, perfect for storing and preserving food. With the improved zipper and an anti-slip design, the reusable sandwich bags for kids is easier to open or close. The colorful zipper of reusable sandwich bags enriching your life more interesting and wonderful.

♻ FREEZER SAFE & EASY TO CLEAN: The freezer bags can lock out freezer burn while keeping food fresh and full of taste, perfect for freezing meat, chicken, fish, fruits, and vegetables. We recommend HAND WASH, for the dishwasher will damage the zipper of the food storage bags. It is easy to clean with the bottle brush and put the bags on the top of a mug or cup to air dry.

♻MULTI-PURPOSE: The 1 reusable gallon bags (11 inches x 10 9/16 inches) are great for marinating meats, frozen foods, cereal, cookies, knitting materials, office supplies. The reusable sandwich bags is 8 5/8x 7 5/8 inch and the reusable snack bags is 8 5/8 x 5 1/4 inch, are the perfect container for sandwiches, snacks, lunch, vegetables, fruit, babies food, cosmetics, jewelry make-up, stationery, travel and more. Transparent design allows for a quick glance at contents inside.

♻100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: One Qinline reusable bags can save up to 350 + disposable bags, not only will change the way you store, cook and even eat. Your little behavior may will save a fish or a turtle. If you are not 100% satisfied with your reusable storage bags, feel free to send us your issues.
